Our tutors are high school students who are skilled in one or more subjects. They have taken honors or AP classes in the subjects of their choice and have teaching experience. Each session is a 1 hour meeting with a tutor to receive homework help or study support with classwork. Our executive board also does a lot of tutoring along with their other duties and you may find them here. Students may sign up for a maximum of two sessions of tutoring per week across all tutors.

OUR TUTORS

Tutor
